definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

sentences.english: The Norwegian mackerel quota will soon be over.
sentences.chinese: 挪威鲭鱼的捕捞配额快用完了。

sentences.english: The other two, with fewer signatories, control blue whiting and mackerel.
sentences.chinese: 另两个协议的签署国较少，管理非洲鳕和鲭鱼。

sentences.english: But they did not come as the Mako had come.
sentences.chinese: 但是它们来的方式和那条灰鲭鲨的不同。

sentences.english: I usually catch fish like mackerel and horsemackerel.
A large mackerel or herring, lightly smoked and salted.
sentences.chinese: 一种体型较大的鲭鱼或鲱鱼，微用烟薰和盐腌。

sentences.english: A white-tailed sea eagle (Haliaeetus albicilla) catching a mackerel inNorway.
sentences.chinese: 图上是一只白尾海雕正在挪威捕食一条鲭鱼。

sentences.english: Bay leaf is an excellent herb for mackerel.
sentences.chinese: 干月桂叶是烹制鲭鱼肉极佳的调味料。

sentences.english: Oily fish such as mackeral, herring, sardines and pilchards are very good for you too.
sentences.chinese: 鲭，青鱼和沙丁鱼之类的油性鱼也是不错的选择。

sentences.english: Salmon, tuna, mackerel and sardines actually prevent arthritis. (fish has omega oils, good for our immune system)
sentences.chinese: 三文鱼，金枪鱼，鲭鱼还有沙丁鱼均可预防关节炎。

definition: sheatfish (Parasilurus asotus)/oriental catfish/see also 鯰|鲶[nian2]
